pages.text: There was a family owned two spirit-infused Ruby Blades. In fact, the family is a Youkai family. To be precise, they are Spirit Foxes.$(br2)One of them is the pioneer of Two-long-blade-wielding Style, but now she is living in seclusion.

Her Ruby Blade infused with her spirit power, and turned into two Spirit Fox Blades.$(br2)The Haze Fox of Repelling, repels any enemies approaching the owner; The Weiss Fox of Luck, seizes treasures from the enemies.$(br2)She with the two beloved Blades is in seclusion now.

If you cannot see the recipe, you may not have Sakura Mod and SJAP Mod installed. But you may use BladeSoul to get the Blade instead.$(br2)If TofuCraftReload Mod is present, something in the recipe will be changed.
